snippet.title: Promise Mascot Agency - Six One Indie Showcase Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet new characters and take a brand new look at Promise Mascot Agency in this latest trailer for the upcoming open-world mascot management crime drama RPG from the creators of Paradise Killer. Promise Mascot Agency is coming to PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Steam Deck and Windows in 2025. 

Explore a cursed Japanese town! Recruit mascot friends and come to the rescue when disaster strikes! Solve the mystery of your exile! Help a living finger work through her many anger issues! Turn Promise Mascot Agency into the best agency in Japan in this open-world narrative adventure!
